    • Method Detail

      • DoubleLocalizer

        public void DoubleLocalizer()
        Localize the machine using 2 light sensors: travel to the black line for x, turn 90, travel to a black line for y, turn -90 fall back for 20 cm, advance until we see lines, back up by 12.6 cm (length between sensor and wheel). reset odometer

      • convertAngle

        public static int convertAngle(double radius,
                               double width,
                               double angle)
        This is a static method that converts the angle needed to turn at a corner to the equivalent total rotation. This method first converts the degrees of rotation, radius of wheels, and width of robot to distance needed to cover by the wheel, then the method calls another static method in process to convert distance to the number of degrees of rotation.
        Parameters:
        radius - - the radius of the wheels
        width - - the track of the robot
        angle - - the angle for the turn
        Returns:
        an int indicating the total rotation sufficient for wheel to cover turn angle
